revised_title: Anomalous Scattering of Beta-Particles and Higher Power Laws of Force
tldr: This article explores the anomalous scattering of beta particles from the quantum mechanical point of view. The authors analyze the effects of higher power laws of force on scattering and discuss the potential role of inverse fifth and sixth power attractive forces, as well as higher power repulsive forces. The study focuses on the scattering of magnesium and aluminum, with the authors suggesting that further experimental data is needed to validate their findings.
